name: Running out of Space (parthnaik, beefeastwood)
description:
Henry Calhoun is just coming home from another late night when he hears a loud noise from Tommy's diner downstairs. Calhoun makes his way down to discover Tommy has disappeared and he's going to be one to investigate.

Control Henry as he weaves his way through a stylized open-world city. Interview strange people, collect clues and discover all the locations in this town that has more questions than answers as the dark truth behind the recent disappearances comes to light.

Controls:

From the main menu

  • Choose dominant hand
  • Choose free or teleport movement
  • Choose smooth or snap rotation

To rotate: Use thumbstick on Dominant hand.

To move: Use thumbstick on non Dominant hand

To pick up: Use grip on either hand.

To speak to People: Aim & hold trigger on Dominant hand

To display map or menu: Face buttons on motion controllers will toggle

To Play:

Investigate an area, talk to people and pick up objects to discover clues on where to go next.
